com.pilot.jword.view
Class PageBlockView

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.text.View
      javax.swing.text.CompositeView
          javax.swing.text.BoxView
              com.pilot.jword.view.PageBlockView
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class PageBlockView
extends javax.swing.text.BoxView

Represents a portion of a page. A single page is divided into PageBlockViews when section changes within the page. PageBlockViews are also divided into PageColumnViews. In case of a single column page, the view has a single PageColumnView.
